description: Retrieve facts about one or more oVirt/RHV virtual machines.

all_content.description: If I(true) all the attributes of the virtual machines should be included in the response.

max.description: The maximum number of results to return.

nested_attributes.description: Specifies list of the attributes which should be fetched from the API.

case_sensitive.description: If I(true) performed search will take case into account.

fetch_nested.description: If I(True) the module will fetch additional data from the API.

auth.description: Dictionary with values needed to create HTTP/HTTPS connection to oVirt:

pattern.description: Search term which is accepted by oVirt/RHV search backend.
